    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_94113</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Corrosive alkalis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ätzende Alkalien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Alcalis corrosifs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alcalóides corrosivos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alcali corrosivi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαβρωτικά αλκάλια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Álcalis corrosivos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows corrosive alkali solutions of sodium hydroxide and potassium hydroxide in their respective bottle containers.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alkali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">corrosive substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potassium hydroxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium hydroxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ätzende Alkalilaugen des 
Natriumhydroxids und des Kaliumhydroxids in ihren jeweiligen Flasche 
Behältern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les solutions alcalines 
corrosives de l'hydroxyde de sodium et de l'hydroxyde de potassium 
dans des leurs récipients respectifs de bouteille.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra soluções de alcalóide
corrosivas do hydroxide do sodium e do hydroxide do potassium em seus 
recipientes respectivos do frasco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le soluzioni alcaline
corrosive dell'idrossido del sodio e dell'idrossido del potassio in 
loro contenitori rispettivi della bottiglia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει διαβρωτικές αλκαλικές 
λύσεις του υδροξειδίου νατρίου και του υδροξειδίου καλίου στα 
αντίστοιχα εμπορευματοκιβώτια μπουκαλιών τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra soluciones alcalinas 
corrosivas del hidróxido del sodio y del hidróxido del potasio en 
sus envases respectivos de la botella.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alkali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ätzende Substanzen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kaliumhydroxid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Natriumhydroxid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">alcali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">substances corrosives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">hydroxyde de potassium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">hydroxyde de sodium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">substâncias corrosivas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">hydroxide do potassium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">hydroxide do sodium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">alcali</string>

          <keyword>
